description: Navigate to 尾上町（バス）. The route proceeds straight along the main road, passing a red sculpture and an APA Hotel on the left. Continue through the intersection with a 7-Eleven on the right corner. The destination, Onoe-cho bus stop, is located on the right side of the street just past the intersection.
